remarks: The lower cut of ` A .P. B ` is a subset of the lower cut of one.  Lemma for ~ recexpr .  (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 27-Dec-2019.)
statement:
recexpr.1 $e |- B = <. { x | E. y ( x <Q y /\ ( *Q ` y ) e. ( 2nd ` A ) ) } , { x | E. y ( y <Q x /\ ( *Q ` y ) e. ( 1st ` A ) ) } >. $.
recexprlemss1l $p |- ( A e. P. -> ( 1st ` ( A .P. B ) ) C_ ( 1st ` 1P ) ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x y $.
$d x y $.
